channel.title: Help with rune arrows ID: 892
channel.description:
Ok basicly you need 40 defence to equip rune arrows. I want to change it to 1 because thats normal and people keep complaining. I searched in client.java for
[code]892[/code]
And there was nothing there to do with 40 skill lvl or anything like that then I searched for
[code]you need 40 defence to equip this item[/code]#
Found nothing im confused I really need to find out how to change the needed lvl to equip them
anyone know please post I would be very greatful

item.title: Help with rune arrows ID: 892
item.dc:creator: @ownageownt ownageownt
item.description:
@ownageownt wrote:

OMFG HERE!

if (ItemID == 892) { return 1; }

Add that under.

GetClDefence

When you search that you should see a bunch of item ids.

Read full topic
